name: Stylus wide & compact
description:
Minimized the waste of space.
Larger and higher css editor.
Main page styled a bit
Editor left panel: show on mouse hover or hidden plus most used elements moved on top of page;
Editor search popup moved on a less intrusive position (bottom right);
Custom font size.

Theme used: Stylus DeepDark by RaitaroH
                        https://userstyles.org/styles/146887/stylus-deepdark
additional_info:
Next update will be a user.css hosted somewhere.

v1.5

v1.4
- Re-fix some font value not applied;
- Increased checkboxes size;
- Editor (only with hover panel): most used elements returned to their original positions.

v1.3
- Fix some font value not applied;
- More exact description.

v1.2
- Added custom base font size (will be increased).
- Added custom editor min height (no more "pinned" like).
- Added three width for the import-export dialog.

v1.0
- Initial release
